title: Naqvi praises security forces for foiling terrorist infiltration from Pak-Afghan border
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 26 (APP): Federal Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi lauded the country’s security forces for successfully thwarting attempts by Khawarij militants to infiltrate from the Pakistan-Afghanistan border.

In a statement issued on Sunday, Naqvi praised the brave and professional security personnel for their timely and decisive actions that led to the elimination of 25 militants, including four suicide bombers.

“The security forces have achieved a major success by sending 25 Khawarij to their ultimate fate,” the minister said, adding that “the nation takes immense pride in the professionalism and courage of our security forces.”

He reaffirmed that the entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with the armed forces in the fight against terrorism.

Naqvi also paid rich tribute to the five soldiers who embraced martyrdom during the operations against the militants. “Our brave sons sacrificed their lives to foil the evil designs of the Khawarij,” he said. “I salute the supreme sacrifices of our martyrs.”
